snp1.4:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ ekanāḷāyaṁ brāhmaṇagāme.
snp1.4:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa pañcamattāni naṅgalasatāni payuttāni honti vappakāle.
snp1.4:1.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto tenupasaṅkami.
snp1.4:1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati.
snp1.4:1.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
snp1.4:2.1_0: Addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṁ.
snp1.4:2.3_0: “ahaṁ kho, samaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca;
snp1.4:2.5_0: Tvampi, samaṇa, kasassu ca vapassu ca;
snp1.4:3.1_0: “Ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca;
snp1.4:3.3_0: “Na kho pana mayaṁ passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṁ vā naṅgalaṁ vā phālaṁ vā pācanaṁ vā balībadde vā.
snp1.4:3.4_0: Atha ca pana bhavaṁ gotamo evamāha:
snp1.4:3.5_0: ‘ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca;
snp1.4:4.1_0: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
snp1.4:10.1_0: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo mahatiyā kaṁsapātiyā pāyasaṁ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavato upanāmesi:
snp1.4:10.4_0: yañhi bhavaṁ gotamo amatapphalaṁ kasiṁ kasatī”ti.
snp1.4:13.1_0: “Atha kassa cāhaṁ, bho gotama, imaṁ pāyasaṁ dammī”ti?
snp1.4:13.2_0: “Na khvāhaṁ taṁ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṁ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā.
snp1.4:13.3_0: Tena hi tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, taṁ pāyasaṁ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī”ti.
snp1.4:14.1_0: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṁ pāyasaṁ appāṇake udake opilāpesi.
snp1.4:14.2_0: Atha kho so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
snp1.4:14.3_0: Seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṁ santatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati;
snp1.4:14.4_0: evamevaṁ so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
snp1.4:15.1_0: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo saṁviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp1.4:15.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp1.4:15.3_0: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya, ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
snp1.4:15.3_1: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
snp1.4:15.4_0: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca, labheyyāhaṁ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
snp1.4:16.1_0: Alattha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
snp1.4:16.2_0: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
snp1.4:16.3_0: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—
snp1.4:16.4_0: brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
snp1.4:16.5_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
snp1.4:16.6_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṁ ahosīti.
